short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Single-button resolution to quickly mark YouTube videos and playlists as not interested.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply hover over a video's details and press the hotkey to mark the video as not interested. Default hotkey ALT+Q.

Don't forget that you can change extension hotkeys at the following webpage: chrome://extensions/shortcuts

Currently only works in English.

Following a recent YouTube update, homepage videos will highlight in the area you need to hover to mark the video as Not Interested!



# Changelog:
Version 2.3
- Fixed a permissions issue that had buttons appearing unnecessarily on music.youtube.com.
- Adjusted some of the CSS styling to make it fit better in some windows.

Version 2.2
As of V2.2 you can now remove videos from a playlist using the same hotkey. Removing videos from your watch later playlist just got easier!
